description:
No need to look for a bike rack, or the ideal spot to lean your bike, this simple kickstand lets you leave your leave your bike upright and ready to roll.

  • Chainstay clamp is easy to mount and adjust, with 3 allen screws
  • Grippy foot prevent slipping
  • Durable cast aluminum and steel construction
  • Adjustable length fits a variety of frame sizes and most 24-28in. wheel bikes
name: 49N Alloy Stay-Mount Kickstand
